Ngomnati jiha Kano ha nder gifa woila woladdu hirna leddi Najeeriya andini labi tokkata ngam sembidina yake jabugo cheede jomorli ha jihakan hautande be sukkugo labi majjugo cheede den fun gam wallita ha hebango jihakn cheede keide de bantata daraja risku jihakan.
Ngomnaajo jiha kan Abba Yusuf nder hallidanno be bibbe lumo ha Kano wii ngomnati makko umman jinna darnde jaba cheede jomorli ha bibbe lumo nden fahin sukkan kala biorde ha cheede den majjirta fun gam heba wallita jiha kan ha moftugo cheede ko bantata risku ummatore.
O wii commitiru maskabe ha fiiji lumo tiggete nden huda be bibbe majalissa jiha kan ngam hoa lawol gotol ngol wallititta ha hebango jihakan labi cheede nastooje be no beddirta dudal cheede de nastinte jonta ha nder jiha kan.
O barri filoobe duggobe yobugo cheede jomorli duuw be dayyo hollugo merare ha filuuji mabbe be habda be yoba hake mabbe ngam wallita jihakan ha dugginki kude de cheede hudata be mum.

Hind bint Abi Umayya (aarabeere: هِؤمَم، Hind ʾibnat ʾAbī ʾUmayya, hedde 580 walla 596 – 680 walla 683),[1][2] d al-Makhzumiyya (Aarabeere: هِؤ ٱلْمَخْزُومِيَّة) ko debbo Muhammadu jeegoɓo.
« Ummu salaama » ko kunya makko maanaa, « yumma salaama ».[3][4] O jeyaa ko e sehilaaɓe Muhammadu rewɓe ɓurɓe waawde. O anndiraa ko ɓuri heewde e siftinde Hadiisuuji keewɗi, walla konnguɗi e nafooje ɗe Muhammadu winndi.[5] Juulɓe Shiite'en ɗon nuɗɗina dow Ummu Salaama woni debbo Muhammadu ɓurduɗo teddugo ɓaawo Khadija.[6]

Caggal jaltugol Ceerno Murtuo aduna fotde balɗe 23, mi etoo hannde hollirde seeɗa he ko Geno anndini mi he makko fotde duuɓi 20 nanɗe e 9 ganndondiral am en. Nde duttagol ceerno naati noppi ɓesngu mum, heewɓe mugaama haa ndoŋki haalde. Miin noon ko he ɓeen njeyaa mi. Mi jaarii kala dillunooɗo he ndee ustaare nde leñol ngol kala renndi, kadi mi duwiima nde Geno moƴƴinta jaaƴnde makko kaŋko e maayɓe Fulɓe e maayɓe juulɓe kala. Yoo Geno heddu karke maɓɓe he winndere. Ko adii nde njumpaten he maayo 
... 
o werlaa Sammba Cooyel, Aliw Bah e Kadiija Bookar min taƴiratnoo ɗeen jolɗe. Ɓesngu leñol ngol to Farayse e Itali e leyɗe godɗe mbaɗii heen jawɗeele e darnde tiiɗnde yanti e darnde ceerno e ballal Geno haa noppi ɗii cukkitii, o natti haaldireede binndi. Habii Jakariyaa Kontee mo Maqaama nde tawnoo ko ngenndiyaŋke, paamɗo darnde ndee heeranaaki tan worɓe kadi jeyaaɗo he ɓurɓe anndude holi Murtuɗo, nde o naati he leydi Farayse, o woor enɗam makko fof, o jippii galle njaatigo ceerno biyateeɗo Saydu
...
ayyaa Joob, Mammadu Saar, Mammadu Aamadu Lih, musidɗo am, giɗo leñol ngol hono sokna Sala Maamuudu Jaaltaaɓe mo Mbaañ e joom galle mum Muusaa Elimaan Joob wonɓe Tuluus.
Ngenndiyaŋkooɓe tedduɓe, ngannden ndonu men he Murtuɗo ko rewindaade jaɓɓal makko e siynude miijooji makko ko adii nde tawoyten mo to guurɗo jaasah. Njokken golle, yoo Geno won Ballo.

Ardiido leddi Najeeriya Bola Ahmed Tinubu yerdi be waduugo baili kandudi ha duuw ardungal kampaniiwa hakkilinowa jairi hite lamtarki nga leddi (NELMCO), ha fahin Ardiido on hokkiti ministaajo fiiji hite leddi , Adelabu Adebayo, duuw darnde horeejo hukuuma kan daga jonta.
Jaburude den ho’ama on bawo nde billaji do fa’a yesso yesso ha nder hukkuma kan hautande be soinde jahol yesso ko hukuuma kan yidata be mum nder dubi ga’endo.
Luttube nder be wannata hukuuma kan baili kessi hauri be ministaajo fiiji cheede , Wale Edun, duuw darnde ballo Ardiido hukkuma kan jonta.
Ha habaruuwol ngol shakkwo habaruuji ha office ru Ardiido leddi,, Ajuri Ngelale, wurtini andini duuw Mrs. Mojoyinoluwa Dekalu-Thomas lamminama duuw darnde Directaajo maudo mo hukuuma kan.

So tawii en mbiyiino, e binndanɗe men ɓennuɗe ɗee, wonde hakkunde Israyiil e Palestiin “ ɗiggataa yuppetaake ”, ngol laawol mbiyaten ko rogere ndee “haƴƴii”. En nduttotaako e daartol no bone hakkunde ɗee leyɗeele ɗiɗi ngummorii, ko e luure ɓooyɗe hakkunde diineeje (yahuud en e juulɓe), ɗum ɓeydii bujitaade ko caggal wolde adunaare adannde e nder leyɗeele Orop, sabu ko ndeen hare yerɓini koɗki e nder ko wiyetee fuɗɗaange hakkundeejo (Moyen orient), ɗo ɓuri teskoreede e oon sahaa, e ko ɓuri teeŋtu
... 
e maɓɓe sabu haaɓde no yahuud en keeynorii nokku oo, ine njaɓɓa aadaaji maɓɓe e diineeji maɓɓe, ɓe keɓta nokkuuji maɓɓe… Kono ko ɓuri heen heewde, keewi ko fooleede, nde wonde ƴaañɓe yahuud en ɓee ko semmbolinɓe, so leyɗeele hirnaange ɗee, hono Orop, teeŋti noon e maamaari mawndi ndii, hono Amerik. Hare maɓɓe ɓurnde maantinde ko nde ɓe ummanino e hitaande 1967 (la guerre des 6 jours – Wolde balɗe 6), aarabeeɓe satiiɓe nokku oo fof, e gardagol Misra e laamu Gamaal Abdel Naseer, ndikkii Israayiil,
...
an, poolgu gooto e felɓondirooɓe ɓee newaaki, wonii Israayiil noon, walla Palestiin, sabu tooñannge no juutiri fof, maa wood ɗo joofi, Afrik Worgo ko yeru. Ndeeɗoo hare hakkunde Hamaas e Israayiil joofaani tawo, sabu won doole goɗɗe ngoni caggal maɓɓe (Amerik, Enngele en, Farayse e yoga e leyɗeele Orop…), jiidaani e pelle goɗɗe ɗe njawnaaki (Hizboullahu “lannda Joomiraaɗo” to Liban e Jihad Lislaam nanndo Hamaas ina keedi caggal Hamaas). Ko ɗum waɗi haala kaa joofaani tawo.

Golle Siyaara Ceerno Saydu Nuuru e Ceerno Muntagaa Taal, he koolol mum 43ɓol timmi hannde Dewo 28, 01,2024 to Jumaa Sayku Umar Taal, he dow laawol Alhajji Maalik Sih, Ndakaaru. Siyaara o ene waɗee hitaande kala, ngam siftorde ɓeen jiyaaɓe Allah, woni Ceerno Saydu Nuuru Taal e Ceerno Muntagaa Taal, laatinooɓe mawɓe ɓesngu e almuuɗɓe Seyku Umar Taal he nder Senegaal.
Ñalɗi ɗii ene mbaɗa hitaande kala he tawtoreede almudɓe Tijjaaniyankooɓe, ummoriiɓe nder wertaago leydi Senegaal he kala, kam e leyɗ
... 
e diina’en Senegaalnaaɓe e Marooknaaɓe teeŋti noon e yimɓe jeyaaɓe he laawol Tijjaaniyah.
Caggal juulal Jumaa, gardiiɗo galle Sayku Umar he Ndakaaru o, Ceerno Madaani Taal, bismiima denndaangal sateeji garnooɗi, kadi o jaɓɓiima hooreejo leydi o, Makki Sal, o jaari ɗum kadi he ballal mum ngal addi mahtagol jumaa Seyku Umar mo Ndakaaru, O duwaniima mawɗo leydi o kadi nde timminirta ngardiigu mum he dow jam e deeƴre. Kanko Kaliifa o hollirii wonnde ngardiigu Makki Sal addanii Senegaal fof ɓural e ɓ
...
ayku kaaɗaani tan he nder Senegaal ne, ko ɗo Halwaar ɗo, he nder leydi Senegaal fof fuɗɗii.
Golle ɗee njokki haa hannde Dewo-hoorebiir, wonndude e dewe Allah, ko wayno jaŋde Qur’aan, wirduuji e duwawuuji, kono kadi jeewte ko toɗɗi nguurndameeje Ceerno Saydu e Ceerno Muntagaa, walla ni Sayku Umar al-Fuutiyyu. Jeewte dingiral kadi mbaɗaama toon tawi yowitii ko he holno jam duumortoo he adunaaru ndu teeŋti he leydi Senegaal, e holno koɗdigal jam-yamal waawirta ñiiɓde hakkunde yimɓe leydi ndii kala.

Ngomnati Lesdi America U.S. tammi anndinki nde wurtinta inde Lekki feere feere ko hewtanta 10 ‘e narral njobdi Ceede man 1 nder Lewru September.
Arddido Lesdi America Joe Biden wadino juude nder Lewru August ko naati nder Diidaadi musamman ngam usta naawol Lekki haa giifakan.
Nder diidaadi din woodi ko sappi ustanki Naye’en marbe Duubi 65 enanta nakisiibe Ceede Lekki.
Gollirde hakkilanta shaanu njamu enanta innu Adama haa Lesdi America. (HHS) (CMS) kambe ma be suuditi nde be anndinta wakkati be watta narral ngal.
Be wi; ” be wurtinan inde ledde den 10 tippungle do hawtaade bee njodi man fun de woore 2023.”
”Kadima nder September 2024, do tuume CMS anndinan ko be narri enanta ko yobete wakkatiire nden nden fuddan huutinirki nder hitaande 2026,” .
SADIQ ALFA

Ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya, Bola Tinubu, tefri taadiibe hawta Ko’e mabbe ngam be renta ummaatoore ‘e jawle mabbe nden be heban jabrude no hurgirta gannudi soynde rento haa nder Lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ardiido on wadi tefre nden nyennde Altine wakkati O yiifoyayno haa ofisru ndu mo hooakata sawriinde dowko laarani rento (NCTC) haa Abuja.
Tinubu wi O besdan hokkuki shaanu rento sembe sanne ngam to wala rento jahargal yeeso kilantaaji riskuuji heba taako nder Lesdi fuu.
Ardiido on wi kuude shaanu Rento hokkete sembe masin nder Lesdi Naajeeriya no foti
Daliido golle NSA, Major-General Babagana Monguno, usi yetti ardiido on bee yaaruki ngilla haa nook O yaari haa nokkuure golle maako no.

Hukuuma moftoowa cheede nastooje maral fada lamorde leddi (FCT-IRS), mabbiti laabi matotiral jamanu andiraduum be e-portal ngam heba sembidina laabi jabuugo cheede jomorli ha yobobe cheede den ngam beddina hukuuma kan hebuugo cheede nastooje keide.
Ardiido hukkuma kan , Mr Haruna Abdullahi, on andini bannin mai ha Abuja nyande salasa do ha wakkati nde o yidanno be marbe juude ha yaake hebango hukuuma kan beddari cheede nastooje, heba sembidina jomorli.
Abdullahi, mo Directaajo maudo mo yebre moftuugo cheede haq hukluuma kan Mrs Chinwe Ndu lutanni wii hukkuama kan wangini dabareeji din on ngam wadda baili ema jahol yesso ha yake moftuugo cheede nastooje ha hukuuma kan be koiduum.

Ñande 27 Juko 2024, terɗe jaaynooɓe e ɗemɗe ngenndiije njooɗdiima e Jaagorgal Pinal, Ñeeñe, jokkondiral e Jotondire parlamaa, Huseynu Wul Meddu.Faandaare ndeen joɗnde, ko duwanaade, jaagorgal ngal nde jogortoo jam e ruttude mo njettoor ngam gollanaade ɗemɗe ngenndiije, ko faati e tiiɗtingol kattanɗe jaayndiyankooɓe.
Ine tawtorenoo Halima Jagana, Sooyaa Wat, Leenaa Seek Jeey, Alasan Umaar Mbooc.
Caggal jeewte gostondire e dow deeƴre, Jaagorgal ngal hesɗitinii coobagol mum jokkude ɓamtude ɗemɗe ngenndiije, fawaade e yiɗde nde laamu nguu hollirnoo.
Ko yalti nder jeewte gostondire ɗee, pellital makko ko wayi no:Ɓamtugol mbaawkaaji jaaynooɓe e ɗemɗe ngenndiije, Ƴellitde miijo sosde rajooji renndo.
Ɓaawo ɗuum, jaagorgal ngal ɗaɓɓii terɗe fedde ndee yo ndaɗɗu peeje golle ngam lebbi 4 keddiiɗi ɗii e hitaande 2024 ndee.
Ciimtol: Alasan Umaar Mbooc
Fulo: Jaayre Pinal-JP

Jam’iya laamanta Lesdi Namibia subi Nandi-Ndaitwah laato Ballo Ardiido Lesdi ndin, nasaraaku man hokki mo bosesel Ardanki Jam’iyawa ngan haa cubi gadeteedi nder hitaande 2024.
Mardo Duubi 70- laatudo Prime Ministaajo Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila enanta ministaajo Seewaaku Pohamba Shifeta gardo lamba 2 haa foondo ngon .
Ardiido Hage Geingob, mo haandi jippa laamu ngam waadu maako timmi Sali yrduki hokkitaaki laamu yaaki mo jabantamo.
“min dali taariiha nde min subi Debboojo jotta nden laati doo on aranndeejo mo hebi nasaraaku laataaki Adiido Lesdi Namiibia nder hitaande 2024..”, rahootooji wi.
Swapo ardani Lesdi has Namibia iga hebuki ndimu hoore maari 1990 nden Jam’iyawa ngan haa jotta kanga burdi margo senbe nder Lesdi Ndin,amma nga fuddi lorki baawo ngam gannudi goddi ko nanndi soynde feesinol golle enanta nanguki ministaajo mo shaanu Luumooku.
Jam’iyawa ngan relli wobbe mabbe ko hewtani 50%, nder 87% .
SADIQ ALFA

Ɗum noon banndiraaɓe fulɓe wuur

e e leydi Misra, nganndee Kawtal men añaani diina, ngal añi ko saɗtin’de diina, kadi wiya hina naatina ɗum e Kawtal. Ɗuum wonaa nafoore men haa teeŋti noon e nder ngal daawal ngal leydi ndii woni jooni.

Mi ruttii Aljerii e nder pikuppuwal, min tun e doginoowo aarabuujo. O inni lan yo mi ƴawu yeeso, mi waɗi ɗun. Witirje otowal ngal no niɓɓintinaa, wontirɗo ɓaawo yi’ataa, fus nder ton, kono an wontirɗo nder on a yi’ay. Ka nder ‘Land cruiser’ a yi’ay ko woni woo.
Kono ton alaa huunde ko ndaaree, fow ko jeerennde. Alaa ko wonaa njaare ko ila e njaare heɓi e njaare. Si tawii hannde en yahii ton an e min, a lanndike lan yo mi naɓe Alserii, mi yi’ataa laawol ngol. Mi yi’ay jeerende kono mi anndataa 
... 
jeerennde.
Adi men hewtude ka keerol, otowal ngal darii e koɗolun, doginoowo on yamiri-mi : « Cippo. » Mi waɗi ɗun. « Libii ko ɗoo hatti », o ɓeyditi, « gila ɗoo, ko koyɗe yaarataa. » « Awa. »
Min hari ɗun sattaa e an sabu hari mi feƴƴirii no ɗoo miɗo jokki ginenaaɓe ɗiɗo, e nder jemmaare. Miɗo anndi ko honno keerol ngol lumbirtee. E saa’i sappo e jeeɗiɗi on, mi ƴoogi ndiyan ka keerol Gadames, mi wattii e maggal mi seppi.
Mi lummbi jemma, gila gaɗa haa gaanin e nder njaareendi. Mi hewti Aljerii 
...
ljerii ko Debdeb.
Ka daral Debdeb, e cokkehun ƴoogirde ndiyan no ɗon. « Yo mi yahu mi juula ɗoo », mi ƴettoyi anniyee. Mi sutii ka juulirde. Adi yo neɗɗo juulu o salligoto : o loota yeeso ngon. Laabi tati. Juuɗe ɗen laabi tati. Haa ka soɓɓundu junngo. O maska hoore nden. O ɓuɓɓina nde wootere, kono ndiyan ɗan no haani yahude haa ka ƴi’al hoore. O sakkitora lootugol koyɗe ɗen. O lootaɗe laabi tati. Si ɗun ɗon gasii, a waaway tun non juulude.
Ko ɗun mi waɗi fii weltanagol Taguɗo on. Libii, lannii.

Naatirdi : Eɗen innira ɗoo « gootiɗingol », ɗiin laabi deweteeɗi ngam suɓaade e lelnude dabi winndude he mbaydi ndenndaandi kala ɗemngal keewngal calti, ɗi mbinnadaaka tawo, maa tawa ko seeɗa winndaa heen. Njaafo-ɗee kam mi jangtanoo on ko kawrunoo-mi : he hitaande 1995, gooto he janngintunooɓe min, tawi min ngonnoo ko he ko yowotii he gootiɗingol ɗemɗe afirikeeje ; ko yowitii he ɗemngal Pulaar o wiyi : « nde Pullo Fuuta Jaloŋ nanondirta e Pullo Aadamaawa heboraani wonde. Wiyde ina wootiɗina ɗem
... 
aylogol e lomlomtindiral alkule. Eɗen mbiya tan ko mbaadi helmere e wowlugol mum, wonande pulfule jaltinooje ɗuum, heewi arde ko he innde, e ciŋkal, e gollal (baɗal), e firlito ɓennungo. Yeru mum ko Pulaar mo Fuuta-Tooro e mo Fuladu; e fulfulde nehaande Maasina (diiwe Bannjagara, Mooɓti, Haayre, ekn. maa e kuuɓal pulfulal ngal Aamadu Hampaate Bah huutorii nder binndanɗe mum); pulfulal Liɓtaako-Jelgooji Rewo Burkina, pulfule Niijeer e pulfulal deeƴtungal Aadamawa.
He ko luulndii ɗum ko pular mo F
...
uji : gorko « (mo anndaaka) », gorko oo « (gorko ganndaaɗo) ». Lomto « oo » so arii ko adii innde, ko jooporgal : oo gorko. So arii caggal innde, wontata ko toɗɗorgal : gorko oo. To pulfulal Aadamawa (goomu Fuɗnaange) ina woodi gane ɗe mbaylotaako (ɗe njahdaani e pelle inɗe, ɗum ko kesum) ; hono « go » maa « man », jogiiɗe darnde toɗɗorɗe : « gorko » (mo anndaaka), « gorko go », « gorko man » (ganndaaɗo).
Kelmeendi…
Haa tonngoode faande (195) njokken.

Kawtal hakkilanta shaanu golloobe ngal NLC wi toni haa ngomnati Lesdi Naajeeriya lornata mballa nyebbam ittido be fuddan tikkere golle nyennde Alarba 7 Lewru June , 2023.
Haalakan wurti on wakkati giidal mabbe nyennde Jumbaare haa Abuja Laamorde Lesdi Naajeeriya,
Hooreejo kawtal ngal NLC Joe Ajaero, wii Ceede kewde majjinaama hedi ko laarani nyebbam dam musamman ngam fintinki injiiji biddata mallabo tafata nyebbam dam haa Lesdi Naajeeriya amma Laabka wanngay sam.
Bawti giidal ngal hooreejo Ajaero tefri ngomnati yawna lincitol haala nballa nyebbam dam koneeba noka waari.
O bsedika bee wiiki haandi NLC nasta sanne ko laarani narral haalakn dooko ngomnati hoosa jabrude ko hoosifu.
Ajaero wi NNPCL wala bawde wiiki nde no nyebbam dam soorirte nder Lesdi Naajeeriya.
“ NLC bee NEC hokki umroore taskaramji tikkere golle mallabo kuude fudde iga wakkati man doole.”, O wi

Koɗo men hannde ko Seeku SIISE, golloowo e fedde winndereyankoore "Plan International"
Saakitaama ñannde :
Koɗo men hannde ko Seeku SIISE, golloowo e fedde winndereyankoore dariinde hakkeeji sukaaɓe (fayɓe) no wi’ee "Plan international". Ko ɓuri janngirɗe ujune 4 ommbaama e nder leyɗe Sahel. Cukaloy ɗeyoy timmukoy ujune ɗiɗi e feccere no waawi accitude jannde muuɗum, ko non holliri ndee walde. Ngam fensitugol ndee limoore e tefugol sabaabe mum, Ibrahiima Timmbi BAH, yewtidii e Seeku SIISE. Heɗoɗenɓe.

Vurous Coronaa alaa ɗo yi’aa e nder Mkka e Madiina / woto juurotooɓe ɓee kul hay huunde
Fedde cellal: hooreejo njuɓɓudi hajju e ziyaara oo tintinii wonde, jaagorgal Arabia Saud kalfinaaɗo kala ko faati e hajju oo hollirii wonde yoo yimɓe pellit wonde alaa ɗo vurous Coronaa yi’aa e nder tuuɗe Makka e Madiina, alaa ko hajjiyaŋkooɓe ɓee poti hulde heen.
Hujjatul islaam wall muslimiina seyid Ahmad Musawii, hooreejo njuɓɓudi hajju e ziyaara oo e nder interviews makko e jaaynde international qur’aana (iqna) e nder jaabuye e kulol ngol yimɓe ngondi e dow ko faati e vurous Corona e nder Arabia Saud, o wi’i: e dow ko faati e vurous hee, mi yeewtidii e jaagor ngal Arabia Saud kalfinaaɗo kala ko faati e hajju oo, o hollirii wonde haa ɗoo ɗo wonaa ɗoo alaa ɗo vurous Coronaa yi’aa e nder tuuɗe Makka e Madiina, alaa ko hajjiyaŋkooɓe ɓee poti hulde heen.
E nder jaabuye naamndal wonde kabaaruuji e dow ko faati e wiide wonde yimɓe nayeeɓe njogoraaki totteede yamiroore fii naatde makka e dow daliila oo ɗoon vurous esko ɗuum kadi ina waawi huptude e yimɓe Iran ɓee kadi, o wi’i: minen gila nde min puɗɗii winndude hajjiyaŋkooɓe nde min ngantinii winndude mawɓe nayeeɓe e wonduɓe e rafiiji fii daliila ɓittoo ɓittoo gonɗo e sera suudu kaaba hee endu ngannduɗaa ina wonaa e feewtineede men mbi’I ɓe wonde yoo ɓe muño haa e hitaande aroore.1264050

Kawte hakkilanta shaanu rento nga (MNJTF) wi nanngi hallube be Lenyol Boko Haram/ISWAP ko hewtani 900.
Haalakan wurti haa mo hakkilanta kubaruuji MNJTF,N’Djamena Chad, Lt.-Col. Kamarudeen Adegoke.
Adegoke wi be kawte hebi nasaraaku sanne ko ustani Boko Haram enanta ISWAP sembe musamma Sooja’en yaaroobe kippe asama dow turtube ben.
Adegoke besdika bee wii kawte Soojaen ben MNJTF besdi sattinki terde mabbe haa bakkeeje den 5 Lewru bawti nannguki kastaabe tuumeteebe Boko Haram, Muhammed Sabo enanta Sarki Danladi nde be habdanno iggitaaki yaaki Galluure Munguno.
Nder ko be jabi haajoode mabbe woni gude suddaki mabbe 2,dereeji dugayeere ngaawol Liddi 2,Agoogooji juude 2, enanta are boraaki mabbe.
Kadima O wi woodi sooja’en do baruye bana Monguno – Kekeno – Cross Kauwa- Baga kambe on nanngi turtube 2 be tawribe enanta Gude kewdum sanne.
Nder jawaabu hooreejo walde nden, MNJTF, Maj.-Gen. AbdulKhalifa Ibrahim, mani tiinaaje Sooja’en gollooben hyaa nokkuure nden fu nden ma O tefri be be besda hooruki hakkiilo mabbe sanne haa golle mabbe ngam be besda hebuki nasaraaku.

seertude toɓɓe, woni gooto heen fof ko toɓɓere mum bannge. Ɗuum woni funeeɓe fuunti funeere. ...
 seerndude ɓe weeɓaani. Ko nehdi e humpitooji e ngonkaaji nguurndam tan kadi ceerndata geɗe maɓɓe seeɗa.
- Funeeɓe “Fuunti funeere” walla “funeeɓe fuunti” ko rennduɓe reedu wooturu, kono tawa gooto e maɓɓe fof ko toɓɓere mum heeriinde (pottital kañtulol gorko e boccoonde debbo). Femmbugal
Femmbugal, ko wi'etee kadi innde boobo maa dennaboo e fulfulde Fuuta Jaloo, maa kadi locital e fulfulde Fuuta Tooro, lamru e maasinakoore maa inndeeri e adamawankoore, ko denndaangal kuuɗe e welo-welooji finaa-tawaa ɗi innde boobo jibinaaɗo suɓetee e mum. Si wonii Fulɓe Fuuta Jaloo, ko nii innde boobo laatorta to maɓɓe:
Fottanaaɗun[taƴto | taƴto ɗaɗi wiki]
E nder Fuuta-Jaloo, innde boobo ko haaju hittuɗo wonannde baaba e neene boobo, musiɓɓe maɓɓe e wondiigu ngun fow. Kono no foti ka a
... 
aa wonnde ko ka walluhaa ɓuri moƴƴude. Mawɓe ɓen waɗanaa ɗun e ɗiɗi si ɓe maaki: ‘’boobo innaaɗo e walluhaa ko wallindirteeɗo’’, kabii o laatoyto wonde neɗɗo welɗo huuwondirde, e ma’anaa o laatoyto wonde neɗɗo gaynoowo haaju e nder ngurndan makko. Fii suɓugol innde nde boobo on innetee nden, ko baaba boobo yaakitoraa. Qur’aana no yamiri julɓe ɓen yo ɓe okku geɗalɓe maɓɓe ɓen inɗe moƴƴuɗe, wano inɗe nulaaɓe ɓen, maa innɗe duhiiɓe maa suddiiɓe daraninooɓe dewal diina lislaamu. Kenen, boobo on inni
...
. Jibanto on ko yo fero ɗun ɗon fow ka tannde. Tuma paykoy e gerto gayni hoccude sadaka on, jibanto on yalta taƴita tannde nden, sollintingol wonnde woofagol makko ngol timmii. Tuma suddiɓe ɓen ñaami ñiiri innde boobo ndin, goro on senndaa, jibanto on e boobo on du’anaa, haray haaju on gasii. Yontere ɓawti ɗun, jibanto on naɓoyay boobo mu’un on wuundino ka mawɓe makko ɓen. O wona ton lewru. Maandinen wonnde ɓaawo ɗo’o hari boobo ko duuɓi ɗiɗi maa tati muynaynoo. Hari biiberon anndaaka fii mu’un.

... 
jaŋde nder ministeeruuji ɗi ɗum toɗɗii ɗii.

Duungal
Duungal (mawninirɗum duunde/suriire), ko wi'etee "continent" e ɗemɗe Faransi e Enngele, e haqiiqa on ko njoorndi, e maanaa leydi njoorundi ndin si eɓɓindiraama e ndiyam, e maayo. Ko tuddere leydi mawnde, nde ndiyam fiiltii. Winndere nden ana jogii duuɗe jowi. Kannje ngoni: Afirik, Yuroopu, Aasiya, Aameerik, Oseyaaniya. No woodi kadi wi'ooɓe Ostarali hade Oseyaani. Woɓɓe kadi na pecca Amriki waɗa duuɗe ɗiɗi: Nano Amriki (Amriki Rewankoori) e Nyaamo Amriki (Amriki Worgankoori. Woɓɓe kadi na ɓeyda heen duungal Antartiki ngal gilaasi woni e dow mum. Wonaa duuɗe fuu piiltiraa ndiyam, e piide misal keerol fay gootol walaa hakkunde duuɗe Yuroopu e Aazi ko taariika e pinal yimɓe majje tan ceerndata ɗe. Wano noon kadi Afirik e Aazi no nanngondiri seeɗa sabu leykal bi'eteekal "Suez" no tokkindiri ɗee duuɗe ɗiɗi.

Ardiido leddi Najeeriya Bola Tinubu lamminii himbe sappo e njeewetato wallobemo kude hedi fiiji fere fere ngam tabitinki jahol yeso ha ngomnati makko ema bantuki daraja riskuu leddi no handi.
Lamminabe man hauri be saurobemo musamman ‘en 6, maube saurobe musamman’en 12, nden be pat mabbe be kuwoto on ha less office ru Ballo Ardiido leddi ngam be mballa mo ha kude hande e jangoo.
Be Ardiido leddi wangini ende mabbe man hauri be Rukaiya El-Rufai, saurowo Ardiido leddi hedi kude chubi ema wailuki baili, Tope Kolade Fasua, Saurowo Ardiido leddi hedi kude risku leddi, Aliyu Modibbo Umar, Sauroowo Ariido leddi hedi kude musamman jee, Hakeem Baba Ahmed, hedi fiiji siyaasa,Special, be Jumoke Oduwole, sauroowo hedi yebree fulu ema wautugo billaji bagge.
Luttube hauri be Sadiq Wanka, saurowo hedi kude maude ema jairi hiite lamtarki, Usman Mohammed, mo kude office ru Ardiido leddi, Kingsley Stanley Nkwocha,saurowo ledi fiiji shakol habaruuji, Ishaq Ningi, Senior saurowo hedi shakkol habaruji je labi jamanu, Peju Adebajo,mo saurata hedi rufool jarfuu ema sorogo kampanijji ngomnati, Mohammed Bulama, eko nandi e mabbe.

Ngomnati mobgal leddi Najeeriya wii tiggugo commitiru ndu lartata no ngomnati beddirta cheede jubdi albashi huwobe pamarun do, do holla duniyaaru anniya ko nga marri ha bantugo daraja huwobe nder leddindi ngam be welnine nden be hokkite hakke mabbe no handi.
Ballo Ardiido leddi Najeeriya Kashim Shettima on andini banning mai nyande salasa do nde o hunnanno wakili’en commitiru ndu yowana dongal lartugo yake beddari cheede albasi huwobe ha leddindi ha sare ngomnati wonde Abuja.
O holli kuide commitiru ndun do marri himmindinare masin ngam hambe on tammi lartugo yake ngurdam huwobe be no be habdata e kude ngomnati hande e jango ngam heba ngomnati wurtina hakke mabbe nden beddina be ko be jabata larugo no ko dume beddiri cheede ha leddindi.
Shettima fodi hakkilo wakili’en commitiru ndun duuw be yauna be wolda be wakili’en kaute huwobe be narra be mabbe nder wakkati heba ngomnati fudda jubdi kesiri na be wonnugo wakkati.
A BELLO

Eɗen poti siftorde ceerno Moktaar Taal : Banndiraaɓe tedduɓe e siyaaruuji ɓennuɗi, en kaaliino ko heewi e ko yowitii e nguurndam ceerno. Hannde etoto-ɗen ko siftinnde toɓɓe kimmuɗe ɗe ceerno Muttaar taal jeertintunoo en e kala sahaa. Inaa heen kulhuli, waylooji e joljole nguurndam men hannde. Hade ɗuum ciftinen huunde e nguurdam makko.
To bannge jibinannde e iwdi : Alhajji ceerno moktaar taal jibinaa ko e hitaande 1936 to bannge tonngi kayitaaji to nokku biyeteeɗo Njorol, fotde 25 kiloomeeter to
... 
diine. So wonaano katantaagal, kaaraysiragal e nuunɗal makko, keɓal hannde ngal woodataano. Eɗen teskoo e ɗeen keɓe : diine e iimanaagal wuro ngoo jogii, jokkere enɗam hakkunde hoɓɓe, hoɗɓe e hoɗdiiɓe ko aldaa e paltoor leƴƴi, nanondiral, dental, ɗooftaare e peewal hakkunde wuurduɓe, duwawuuju makko e duwawuuji moƴƴuɓe ɓe o jotondirnoo, koɗki e faggudu (sabu omo sifortonoo hoɗorde no faayiida koɗɗo, no teddungal, geɗal timminoowal jilliiɗo, riiwtoore faaɗeende e fawre.
Ngadduki kesiri (kulhuli) 
...
ydii en ustaaki e diine men. Ko Allah ñaagi-ɗen ballal e barke fayde e ɗee golle, yo Allah waɗ ɗe golle laaɓɗe, jaɓaaɗe, waɗa e njeñtudi majje nafoore julɓe fof. Allah juulii e nulaaɗo mum Muhammadu hisnii, yo o yurmo o yaafoo aaleeɓe e sahabaaɓe makko, o waɗta en heen, enen e jinnaaɓe, e seeremɓe kam e denndaangal juulɓe.
Yo Allah yurmo, yaafoo mo, aljanna wona jaaƴnde, toon wona fooftorde makko, kanko e kala maayɗo juulɗo.
Suwoyraat ñalnde 18-10-2014

Juulɗo, Abdul Ama, holi aan ? ko deftere luutiire nde jinnaaɗo men, Doktoor Umaar Bah mo Dabbe winndunoo, sankaare yani tawi nde joofaani. Ko ɗuum jeyi sabaabu ɓamtu-ɗen ndeeɗoo tiitoonde ngam suɗirde winndannde mem faytunde e nguurndam makko.
Eɗen njaafnoo banndiraaɓe noon sabu ngolɗoo ciimtol ena fotnoo yaltude gila e lewru feebariyee maayndu nduu, kono ko caɗeele caabinoo ɗum.
Ñalnde aset (hoore-biir), 8 lewru marse (mbooy), hitaande 2014 waɗti duuɓi ɗiɗi ko ɓiy yu
... 
ji joy (galleeji 5) cumi. Nde galle gadiiɗo oo huɓɓi, yimɓe cikkatnoo woni sabaabu mum ko ŋakkere teylaare to bannge wonooɓe e kaatane ndefu walla urooɓe cuuɗi mum en.
Ilam Nuwaasoot ina foti jeertaneede : Waɗi ngoo jeertinaango ko Ibraahiima Caw, gardiiɗo Tuugnorgal Sato Fedde Ngenndiije (PNUE : Programme des Nations Unies pour l'environnement) ñalnde alkamiisa 23/01/2014. O hollitii wonde « nokkuuji keewɗi e wuro Nuwaasoot ngoo ɓuri geec lesɗude, tawi kadi tulde ceenal paddorɗe geec ɗee tiiɗaa
...
aayd) wallitii no feewi leydi ndii daɗde e musiiba hare ɓesngu ».
E wiyde pelle nay daraniiɗe jojjanɗe aadee (AMDH, AFCF, CR, SOS-ESLAVES), Muhammed el Muttaar el Shingiti, oon binndunooɗo ko heewi ko faati e « Daartol njiyaagu e nder defte laawol Maalik », sibu o winndii to o woni to Dohaa too, o wiyi : « Sariya jaɓaani warngo jedditiiɗo, tee ɗum meeɗaa kewde e nguurndam Nulaaɗo (MJKM) walla e nguurndam sahabaaɓe mum, ɓe nganndu-ɗaa golle mum en e haala mum en ngoɗɗondiraani e binndi Quraana ».

Dental leyɗe hirnaange Afrik CEDEAO ɓamtii yagginanɗe ɗe nde fawunoo e hoore, Niijeer. Gila e udditugol keeri leydi ndin haa e gollidal e baŋŋe faggudu. Ɗee yannginanɗe ittaama. Ko saabii yo hooreeɓe leyɗe Afrik ɓamtu ɗe , ko newinngol guurɗam jamaa Niijeer e nder lewru korka. Haa hannde alaa ko konu Ñaamey haali caggal ittegol ɗee pawe yagginirɗe. E bi’ol Mammadu Albeer SIH hertorɗo dawro, hooreeɓe CEDEAO faamii wonnde ɗee yagginanɗe ko ɓiɓɓe Niijeer tan lorri. O hollii ngam heɓtugol darnde maggal, dental CEDEAO hino haani ɓeydude cemmbe mum e baŋŋe diplomaasi, wonndude e heblugol konu leyɗe ɗee. Himo jaaboo lamnde Ibrahiima Timmbi Bah.
Mammadu Albeer SI, ganndo hertorɗo dawro © RFI FULFULDE

Juulde Taski hikka no hawri e rafi koronavirus eno laya e nder windere nde
Saakitaama ñannde :
Holno Yimbe bem ndaroorto faade e odoo nialawma njoortaade dente kewde?
Nialawma hande o men jewta ko yowitii e e julde taaski Odon gandi Julde Taaski on mawninaama hanki e yogga e leydelle Afrik. Hikka nialawma no hawri e niaw koronavirus eno laya e nder windere nde.
Don do cafroobe njertinta laygol rafi on e taabe jaawde. Holno Yimbe bem ndaroorto faade e odoo nialawma njoortaade dente kewde?
Mbelle watiyaaji dentoordi rafi on eno jokaa? Holno pod den daraade e oodo dumulla? Jewtidiid do men e Ko mbiidon wiyete ko Mme Binta Bocum Sarr tawaa e suudu safrirdu do e Senegal no wiyee sentre des operasion d’urgense sanitair kanbe kalfinaa kala ko faati e niaw koronavirus.
Kono ko adii dum en djahat haa to wuro Ziginchor djokondiren et djoodaniido en ton Mamadu Alfa Jallow. Ndjoofniren et totouddé kongol Gooto et sukaabé naalankoobé mbo wiyee Supi Mbaalo.

Hooreejo mo hakkilanta shaanu Dabbaaji haa Jihawol Taraba (L-PRES), Mr Hananiah Albert, wi Himbe ko hewtani 40,000 tammi botirki bee taskaramji ngomnati kawtal Lesdi ko laarani shaanu durngol.
Albert suuditi haalakan haa galluure Jalingo wakkati be omta komitiwa hakkilant taskaramka .
Nder jawaabu maako O sappi bee wiiki dow bete ko taskaramka saawi kewdum sanne.
O besdika bee wiki ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya Debbo’e Gorko ko hewtanta 1.43 millionji botiran bee taskaramka R ewbe hnder mabbe hewtani gebe 30.
Ballo ngomnaajo Jihakan Aminu Alkali, kanyum on luutani ngomnaajo Jihakan wi be taskani joguki taskaramka juude 2 ngam be walla ummaatoore Jihakan hedi shaanu ndemri ‘e Durngol sanne ngam be botira bee maaka.
Nder jawaabu comisinaajo mo hakkilanta shaanu ndemri, Prof. Nicholas Namessan, wanginiido seyo muudum sanne bee taskaramka ngam yiiki ka woodi nafu sanne.
SADIQ ALFA

Kaaɗn koojn̰ Isa
(Mt 1.18‑25; Mis 5.1‑2; Eza 7.14, 9.5)
1 Kaaɗ kɛn se, Gaar magal iŋg *Rɔm ki kɛn kꞋdaŋin̰ Sezar Ogust se, ɔlo ɔɔ jee taa naaŋin̰ ki paac se jꞋaɗen Ꞌɓaa mɛɗɛ. 2 Mɛɗn deet deet bin se baag kaaɗ kɛn Kirinius ɓo magal jee taa naaŋ Siri ki. 3 Jeege paac, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo iin̰ ɓaa maakŋ naaŋin̰ ki taa jꞋan̰ ɓaa mɛɗɛ. 4 Taa naan̰ se ɓo Yusup iin̰o maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Nazarɛt kɛn taa naaŋ Galile ki, naan̰ kic ook ɓaa maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Betleem kɛn taa naaŋ Jude ki. Betleem se, gɔtn jꞋoojn̰ G
... 
gaan dɛɛrgen kuuy dio.† Aak Lb 12.8.
Simɛon tɔɔm Raa taa Isa
25 Anum maakŋ Jeruzalɛm ki se, gaaba kalaŋ ron̰ Simɛon. Naan̰ se debm daan ki ɔɔ ɔk ɗoobm Raa ɔɔn̰ɔ. Naan̰ iŋg aak kaam debm kɛn utu Ꞌkaajn̰ gaan *Israɛlge ɔɔ *Nirl Salal utu te naan̰a. 26 Nirl Salal taaɗin̰oga taaɗa ɔɔ: «Naai se Ꞌkooy eyo Ꞌtiŋg bini utu Ꞌkaakŋ ute kaami *al‑Masi kɛn Mɛljege Raa utu an̰o kɔl se jaayo.» 27 Nirl Salal ɔl Simɛon iin̰ ɓaa maakŋ *Ɓee Raa ki ɔɔ kaaɗ kɛn se ɓo bubm Isa ute kon̰a ɓaansin̰o naan Raa ki gɛn tɛɗn
...
ɓm ɗi bini? ꞋBooyo, maam ute bubi se, nirlje teecga kꞋlee kꞋjei jea.» 49 Num gɔtn se Isa tɛrlɗen ɔɔ: «Naase Ꞌjemki gɛn ɗi? Naase Ꞌjeelki ey la kɛn maam mꞋɓaaɗo tap ɓo gɛn maakŋ ɓee Bubum se?» 50 Gaŋ taar kɛn naan̰ taaɗɗen se, naaɗe ɔŋ booy ɔk te mɛtin̰ eyo. 51 Gɔtn se naan̰ iin̰ bɔɔy ɓaa ute naaɗe Nazarɛt ki ɔɔ daayum naan̰ lee took taarɗe. Anum nakgen deel paacn̰ ese se, kon̰ se ɔkin̰ maakin̰ ki.
52 Ɔɔ Isa se teepe ɔɔ jeel‑taara ɓaa te naanin̰a. Kɛn Raa aakin̰ se, tɔɔlin̰ ɔɔ tɔɔl jeege tu kici.

Macce Kereku, gooto e meeɗnooɓe ardaade leydi Benin, sankiima ñalnde alarba 14 oktoobar 2015, ina yahra e duuɓi 72.
Macee Kereku jibinanoo ko ñalnde 2 settaambar 1933 to Kuwarfa. O janngii e duɗal konu to Kati (Mali), to Ndar (Senegaal), to Duɗal konu Fréjus (Farayse), e to Ekkol Taamasoor Paris. Caggal ɗuum o wonii edkaa (Aide de camp) hooreejo gadano leydi Dahomee, hono Hubert Maga tuggi 1960 haa 1963.
Ñalnde talaata 8 settaambar 2015 mawɗo hilifaaɓe hono Yahyaa wul Hademiin yeewtidii e yonaa
...
e 1 240. Ko kayri woni araniri ndin e laamateeriiji mawɗi nantuɗi innde feeñunooɗi Afrik Hiirnaange feewndo ka Yonta Hakkundeejo (Moyen-Âge).
Caggal nde laamu arti ɗo wonnoo, batu hilifaaɓe Burkinaa jooɗiima ñalnde aljumaa 25 settaambar 2015. Eɗen mbaawi wiyde « cabbi gorle mbeñtitiima », sibu batu nguu ƴettii kuulal maantinngal, so fusde RSP, (woni BASEP mo Burkinaa) hono koyngal konu cosanoongal e laamu Belees Kompaawore, ngal alaa ko woni golle mum so wonaa reende mo, e... waɗde kuudetaaji...

sabaabu mum woni Peeral hakanooma e lewru yunaayiru 2013, template mayre bonnaa, non kadi piiji ɗuuɗuɗi e nder mayre.

murtitani ƁALEEƁE CEPPI NGAM ÑAAWOORE MAAWIYYA E WATULAAƁE MUM
ƁALEEƁE CEPPI NGAM ÑAAWOORE MAAWIYYA E WATULAAƁE MUM
Yimmɓe ɓaleeɓe limtinɓe gollotooɓe e pelle haɓantooɓe hakke inama aade mbaɗih seppo hannki talaata yeeso nokku jaagorɗo kalfinaaɗo ko faati e ñaawoore ɗoo e nuwaasot ngam ɗaɓɓitdde ñaawoore laaminooɗo leydi ndi Maawiya e yoga e watulaaɓe makko ɓeɓe tuumi ina njeya e wallitnooɓe bonandeeji ɓaleeɓe mbaɗano e kitaale 89 haa 91,
Ɓe mbiyi warnooɓe miniteeruuji ɓaleeɓe noogas e njeetato ɓee ñande 28 Novembre 1990 to inal yoo njagge ñaawee ko yaacci.
Seppo ngo ñaagiima kadi nde macungaagu nattata e leydi ndi sabu hay ko ɗum haɗiraa kuugal koo nattaani.
Nde ɗum ɓenni ɓe mbiy eɓe ɓenna to galle laamɗo leydi ndi ɓe njaggondiri e poliseeji ɓeen cariɓe .

Senegaalnaajo biyeteeɗo Muhammed Mujtaba Jallo, jahroowo e duuɓi 18, almuudo to Duɗal Daarul Iimaan mo Sicap Mbao, hooniima e kawgel 59ɓel Dental winnderewal jaŋde e kuñagol Quraana juɓɓinanoongel to leydi Malesi e lewru mee 2017. Ine tawtoranoo kawgel ngel capanɗe yimɓe woɗɓe ummoriiɓe e leyɗe juulɓe goɗɗe. Rawane ko kanko hawnoo e kawgel jaŋde Quraana e leydi Senegaal, ko jiidaa e tawtoregol makko kawgelaaji goɗɗi to Koddiwaar, Sudaan, Sawuud ɗi o hoonii heen huunde. Waɗi en wiyde Senegaal nawii raay, ko sibu tataɓo oo kadi e ngelɗoo kawgel Malesi, ko suka debbo senegaalnaajo ine wiyee Ndey Jaara Ngom ummoriiɗo to Tuubaa, jahannooɗo Senegaal e kawgel Dubay 2016.

Hooreejo hiitoobe jogoowo hiddiiko hunnaado keso haa Lesdi Naajeeriya, Justice Olukayode Ariwoola, wi jogan kuude maako jonngo didi bananta no diidaadi sappi.
Justice Ariwoola suuditi haalakan bawti be hunni mo haa hodorde ngomnati haa Abuja.
O wi: “mi wadanan ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya ko haandi ko diidaadi Lesdi Naajeeriya sappi mia wadan fodde bawde am mi semtinta ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya.”
Kadima o wi “wala synde narral ko haa’otiral hakkunde mabbe haa hiitordu ndu nden be fu be gootel, hooreejo on boymaajo (Justice Ibrahim Tanko) dali golle on ngam soynde njamu maako.
Fakat “woodi ganndi min wontiri amma seesiseesi min do hurga gannudi din hakkunde amin.” O wi
Hoore’en ben hewtani 14 bee hunnaado keso do ko fudda warki hhannde.CJN.
Justice Ariwoola hunnaama on ngam O luutana Justice Tanko, daliido korowal maako nyennde Alat 26 Lewru June, ngam daliila njamu maako.
SADIQ ALFA

Ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari holli suno maako bee sanadu ko halki himbe ko hewtanta 29 haa Gidan Magana nder Galluure Shagari Jihawol Sokoto.
Ardiido on yottini kofli foofo maako yaaki lenyol sooyiibe yonki mabbe haa maayo ngo Gidan Magana, musamman Malam Muhammadu Auwal, mo sooyi bibbe maako ko hewtanta 5.
Kadima Ardiido Buhari tefri hukuuma hakkilanta shaanu nyam nder Lesdi Naajeeriya besda hooruki hakkiilo dow ko laarani fe’aano bana ni ngam rentuki yonki ummaatoore.
Haa ragare Buhari hofni ngomnati enanta ummaatoore Jiha Sokoto fuu bee ko fe’i.
Sadiq Alfa.

Batu jaagorɗe hannde laamu leydi Muritani, rokkii yamiroore feccitaade won e gure mbaɗtee kominaaji. Kominaaji 20 kesi, maa ɓeyde tawi ko ɓuri heewde heen wonata ko palɗe kese cosaaɗe lebbi jawtuɗi ɗii.
E ngol ɗoon peccitagol, laamu nguu hollitii:
- Maa komin keso ɓeyde to Walata
- Diiwal Hod bannge fuɗnaange, Kominaaji 3 kesi to Adel Bagru kominaaji 3 kesi to Amurj
- Diiwal Baraknaa maa heɓ kominaaji 5:
- Diiwal Tararza falnde Teekaan, maa heɓ kominaaji 4
-Diiwal Gidimaka, falnde wompu ne heɓa kominaaji 8 ko noon ne kadi to Gaabu heɓa kominaaji 6

Ɓeeynirɗe tati duñooɗe e lebbi suwee-sulyee 2020 faade Mbaañ (Mars), njettiima toon e lewru feebariyee 2021 ɓennundu nduu. Heen ɓeeynirɗe ɗiɗi, ka Emiraat leyɗe Aarabeeɓe inniraaka “Yaakaare” e ka Siin (Tianwen-1) ngidii yettaade, nana taartoo Mbaañ, tataɓa kaa, hono “Perseverance” juuriima toon ñalnde 18 feebariyee 2021. Yah-ngartaa fof alaa ko nawi toon aadee so wonaa ƴeewde mbele toon ine hoɗoo… Jokku to hello 8
He lewru sulyee 2020, Fooyre yaltiniino winndannde tiitoriinde « Loskugol tagofee
... 
aana njirlatooka (orbiteur), laana njuurnoowa (atterrisseur), kam e ndeegoowa (rover) ka 240 kg. Ɗoo e ndeen maa njirlotooka kaa ƴettu nate Mbaañ boowal Utopia Planita, woni boowal jaajngal gonngal to feccere rewo, ngam maantaade nokku ɗo njuurotooka kaa fotata juuroyaade, tawa ko nokku bertiiɗo mo heewaani kaaƴe. So geɗe ɗee njahrii no feewi, ko Siin wonata leydi ɗimmiri juurnude huunde dow Mbaañ. He lewru desaambar 2020, lappol Chang’e 5 woni gadanol caggal kitaale 1970, artirde kaaƴe Lewru he
...
f woni maale nguurndam). Kono ngam anndude mbele ɗuum ummii ko e he nguurndam ine ɗaɓɓi losko luggo ngo waawaa waɗeede toon, ɗuum addani en artirde mbaañiri ndii gaa e Leydi ngam waɗde ngoon losko luggo.
Hol njuuteendi losko ngoo fof ? Lebbi 6 ngam yahde toon, duuɓi jeegom ngam ƴettude toon mbaañiri ndii, lappol goɗngol nana heblee ine wiyee Mars Orbiter potngal yahde toon laabi ɗiɗi, ƴetta mbaañiri ndi perseverance woppi toon ndii, ngam artirde ɗum he Leydi, ɗum noon maa yettinoy en hedde 2031.

Lesdi Russia taskani sankutuki Sooja’en mabbe haa keeri Lesdi Ukrainian ngan yummunki hakkiilo be kawtal (NATO), tumbalji Lesdi ndin Kremlin, Dmitry Peskov on suuditika
O“laati doole min yawna sankitaaki sooja’en amin haa nokkuure nden ngam no hakkiilo yummiri haa giifakan.
“Russia haandi hoosa jaabrude kanndude dowko laarani kawtal NATO ngam yiiki taskaramji mabbe haa keeri ndin.
Lesdi Russia lornay hakkiilo bee kabbidal narral ko wada hakkunde mabbe bee Lesdi America.
Russia do taskani yaaruki kippe toni haa narral wadaaka hakkunde mabbe.
Tippungel do on chiimajo Lesdi Russia Wadi giidal bee nanta Lesdi America haa Geneva dow ko laarani shaanu Rento.

Waylugol walla moƴƴingol ñamri e nder Senegaal
Saakitaama ñannde :
E alet hannde, kaalaten ko e golle paatuuɗe e baylugol ñaameteeji. E nder hirnaage Afrik, ko Senegaal woni leydi ɗiɗaɓiri e jogagol waylooɓe walla moƴƴinooɓe ñamri caagal Kodiwaar. E ɗii ɗubi cakkitiiɗi jiibinama sosiyeteji keewɗi hertorɗi ɗen golle, Sosiyeteeji kuutorooji njenycudi gollaandi to men.
Sosiyeteeji sincaaɗi e nder leyɗe Afrik, gollayɗi mgam waylugol ñamri no wallitii sanne bamtugol faggudu dowri.
Koɗo men hannde ko 
... 
rmata Bari, mo ley-Senegaal gollanoowo hoore mum. Ko o bayloowo ñaameteeji moƴƴinaaɗi to men. Omo dilla kadi e fannu eltuugol faalaaɓe gollande hoore mum wano makko.
Kafal mako wala sosiyetee mako ina wi’ee « Ɓamtaare », innde njenycudi mako ina wi’ee « Ndenka ».
Ma o artan en hol ko waɗi o ummini ɗee golle ɗe o waaɗata? Nde o fuuɗii ɗe? mbele ina addana mo ngartal e faa’ida?
Caggal Farmaata Bari, en keɗoto jiyanɗe mon ɗe accuɗon e whatsapp: Hol ko woni miijo mon e ñaamude, walla faggaade, njenc
...
i walla ñamri gollaandi to men.
So ɗum ɓennii, en keɗoto ko Ceerno men Iisaa Jallo addii e damal Fulfulde Faaminiinde .
Caggal Farmaata Bari, en keɗoto miijooji mon walla jiyanɗe mon ɗe accuɗon e WhatsApp taskaram oo.
So ɗum ɓennii, en keɗoto Profeseer Iisaa Jallo addii e damal Fulfulde Faaminiinde .

Ɗerol Yahaaya tataɓol
Habaru dow ɗerol ngool
Yahaaya ɓii-Jebede, aahiijo Iisa *Almasiihu, winndii ɗerol yahde he Gayus. Gayus no tokki goonga, omo gollida mo, omo walla goonɗinɓe duu. Amma Diyoterefes kay salake haalaaji Yahaaya, o hiɗaa duu weernude goonɗinɓe Iisa.
Ko winndaa nder ɗerol ngool :
Cannooje (1-4)
Wallude sankitooɓe Habaru lobbo nokku fuu (5-8)
Laawol Diyoterefes he laawol Demetirus (9-12)
Baynodirol (13-15)
1
Cannooje

... 
 meeɗen ɓe annduɗaa he baa ɓe a anndaa, no kollaa ko a kolniiɗo. 6 Ɓe ngaddi haala hidde maaɗa yeeso hawriine amin. Mi eeli ma walluɓe no welirta Alla heɓa ɓe ngaɗa jahaangal maɓɓe no haandiri. 7 Ngam kamɓe duu, dow innde *Almasiihu ɓe ngaɗata jahaangal maɓɓe. Ɓe tefataa fuu balla gom he mo goonɗinaay Iisa. 8 Ndenne, enen goonɗinɓe Iisa, eɗen kaani wallude ir himɓe ɓee, ngam laatoɗen wallooɓe goonga oon sankitoo nokku fuu.

fuu no neɗɗo Alla. Gaɗoowo ko boni anndaa Alla abada. 12 Demetirus no neɗɗo lobbo, himɓe fuu no pilloo habaru makko, sabu nde nii goonga e hoore mum no woodunoo hunnduko wi'annoo o neɗɗo lobbo. Minen duu, miɗen kooli mo, aɗa anndi duu ceedaaku amin no goonga.

Ko sappo e goo lawake njogori fooɗondirde lefol laamu leydi Farayse e suɓngooji alet 23 Awril. Suɓngooji ɓurɗi udditaade e daartol politik Farayse sabu gonnooɗo hooreejo oo waasde ɗum jeyeede heen. Ko ɓee ɗoo sappo e goo njogori fooɗondirde lefol ngol.
Ina heen ina jogaa njoorto maa njawtu daawal gadanal. Ina imee heen:
Marine Lopen ko ganndaaɗo sabu baaba makko Jean Mari Lopen ko kam ardinoo lannda makko kaa, o lomtii ɗum.
Fraasuwaa Fiyon ina joganoo yaakaare hay so tawii dille e tuumo pawaaɗo e makko woodat ko usti e arsuka makko
Jacques Cheminade ko mawɗo soodaani ganndal e woote ɗee
Emaniyel makron ina jeyaa e waawɓe yahde daawal ɗimmal
Benoit Hamon ina waawi yawtude e daawal ɗimmal
Jean Lassale,ko Sammba noddaaka nootii. Cukaagu makko ko njogitaari makko.
So diwtii ɓee ɗoo, heddiɓe ɓee ina mbaawi wonde duusooɓe.
Jean Luc Melenchon, Nikolas Dupont, Nathalie Arthaud,Philip Potou,Fransuwaa Asleno,

Ardiibe kawte Lesde Africa Hirnaangeeje wi ittanan Lesdi Mali hombere nder Lewru Jenuary bawti ardiibe sooja’en Lesdi ndin wi see baawo duubi 4 laa hokkititte.
ECOWAS suuditi haalakan haa Accra laamorde Lesdi Ghana, ko nden on be meti dudka hawtaade bee Lesde de be jabti laamu bana Burkina Faso enanta Guinea.
ECOWAS ittani Lesdi Mali hombere ko be wadani be fu.
Hiitordu ndu kilantaaji riskuuji Lesde Africa on ittani Lesdi Mali hombere ngam yiiki no neddaaku ummaatoore Lesdi Mali nyaamirte.
Ardiido ECOWAS Jean-Claude Kassi Brou wi see marbe bawde tan ittanta Lesdi Mali hombere.
O wi Ardiibe ECOWAS wi yi laamu dimocradiyya fuddite haa Lesdi ndin hakkunde lebbi 18 yaago 24 ha Mali.
Lesdi Mali, Guinea enanta Burkina Faso Lesde on marde Sembe ha nder 15 kawte Lesde Africa
Amma ECOWAS jabi dereeji laatuki mabbe wakiili’en haa ECOWAS ngam sooja’en jabti laamu haa Lesde den.
SADIQ ALFA

Tokkerre fijoobe Bol be Bendel Insurance FC ha Jihawol Benin hebi nasaraaku haa fijirde mabbe nyennde Asawe bee Plateau United FC be Jos bee boggi 1-0 wakkati fijirde nde (NPFL).
Fijirde nden fijaama on haa daldal fijirde nde Samuel Ogbemudia Stadium, nder Galluure Benin City.
Nasaraaku ngun hebaama on nder mintiiji 15 bawti be waddi Benjamin Tanimu haa fijirde yeeso.
Tanimu wari yeeso ngam fijuki ko anndira penalty bawti be jos toonyi haa nokkuure nde toonyaataake.
Be tokkere nden nde Jos wadi fodde bawde mabbe ngam yiiki be waatiti amma niiman saldori sam.
SADIQ ALFA

Caggal « Binndanɗe Hiisiyankooje » e « Gannde Hiisiwe », ndeeɗoo deftere woni deftere tataɓere nde Muhammadu Faalil Sih winndi en nder duuɓi joy, faatunde e hiisiwal. e (e ko ɓuri teeŋtude), wonde ɗemɗe men ɗee ina mbaawi tigi roondanaade denndaangal gannde goodɗe ɗee. ...
, e suusnude laamuuji ɗii waɗde jaŋɗeele ɗee he nder ɗemɗe neeniije leyɗeele mum en. Muhammadu F. Sih rokkii ɗoo yimɓe ɓe nganndaano, fartaŋŋe humpitaade ganndal luggal he nder ɗemngal Pulaar, o rokkii anndunooɓe fartaŋŋe siftorde e luggiɗinaade he ngalɗoo ganndal. Ñalnde 11 feebariyee 2013, Masawuud wul Bulkayri hollitii miijo sakkiti ngam wallitde leydi ndii yaltude e kiris politik wuuri hannde oo. Ceŋɗe politik leydi ndii kala tawtoraama kewu ngu to Galle Mooɓondire, gila e CAD, haa e COD, haa e UPR e yahdiiɓe mum, e pelle renndo e hoohooɓe teelɗuɓe.
O inniri feere makko ndee ko « Muritani tawo !». E nder konngol makko ñalnde heen, o wasiyiima Muritani nde wallondirta e aduna oo, haa arti noon e leyɗe keediiɗe ɗee, ngam wallitde Mali hisnude ngootaagu mum e goodal mum. O wiyi faandaare feere makko nde ko tiiɗtinde kaɓɓondiral yimɓe leydi ndii rewrude e nanondiral politik mbele yimɓe ina mbaawa yuɓɓinde woote bellitiiɗe, nuunɗuɗe, koolniiɗe. Eɗen ciftina tan Abdel Asiis hollitiino wonde jaɓaani miijo compugol guwarnama nanondiral, sibu, e miijo makko, caɗeele ngalaa e leydi hee. Senngo politik wiyeteengo COD ngoo, wiyiino ina fadi haa Masawuud laɓɓitina miijo mum nde yeewta heen.

Naan̰ se kon̰ mɛnd Yaud kɛn aalga kaal maakin̰ do Isa ki kici; gaŋ bubin̰ se, kɔɗ Grɛk. 2Timote se, gɛnaagen ɗoobm al‑Masi kɛn maakŋ gɛgɛrge tun Listir ute kɛn Ikɔniɔm ki, paac se tɔɔmin̰a. 3Gɔtn se Pɔl je ɔɔ k'ɓaa tɛlɛ, naɓo taa Yaudgen iŋg maakŋ gɛgɛrge tun ese se, naan̰ ɔjin̰ pɔndɔ, taa jeegen paacn̰ gɔtn ese se jeelin̰ naan̰ se bubin̰ kɔɗ Grɛk.

 ki makɔn̰ɔ ɔɔ dɔɔk taara ɔn̰ eyo ɗeek ɔɔ: «Jee ese se, naaɗe jee tɛɗn naabm Raagen Taaro! Naaɗe ɓaaɗo se taa asen taaɗn ɗoobm kaaja!» 18Mɛnd se ɔk mɛtje ɓii kando kando bini ɔl ɓii kalaŋ Pɔl ɔɔr se, tɛrl aakin̰a ɔɔ ɗeek sitan kɛn ron̰ ki se ɔɔ: «Ute ro Isa al‑Masi se m'ɔɔ: 'teec naatn ro mɛnd kɛn se!» Gɔtn se sum ɓo, sitan se naar teec naatn ron̰ ki. 19Kɛn mɛlin̰ge jaay aakin̰ naan̰ dukaakin̰ lɛ gɔtɔga ɔɔ ɗoobm naaɗe an kɔŋ gurs kic ɓo gɔtɔga se, naaɗe tɔk Pɔl ute Silas ɔɔ ɓaanɗen naan magalge 
...
ɓo aɗe ɓaa utu ajen tɔɔɗn naatn maakŋ daŋgay ki se.» 38Asgargen j'ɔlɗeno jaay ɔk tɛrl ɓaa se ɓaa taaɗ taar se magalge tun Rɔmɛge tɔndɗe se. Kɛn magalgen se jaay booy ɔɔ Pɔl ute Silas kic ɓo Rɔmɛge se, gɔtn se ɓeere ɓaa ɔkɗe. 39Naaɗe ɓaaɗo ɔŋɗe ɔɔ tɛɗɗen kalɗɛ jaay tɔɔɗ tɔlɗe ɔɔ taaɗɗen ɔɔ k'j'iin̰ k'j'ɔn̰ɗe maakŋ gɛgɛrɗe se. 40Kɛn Pɔl ute Silas jaay teeco maakŋ daŋgay ki se, naaɗe ɓaa gɔtn Lidi ki. Ngomna’en Jihaaji Lesdi Naajeeriya hawti taskani taskaram sendanki ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya Ceede ngam ustanabe yanngada ittuki mballa nyebbam peeturuljam hedi laabi tongitol inde mabbe.
Niiman wadaama on bawti tigguki komitiwa ko hakkilanta haalakan.
Ngomnaajo Jihawol Ogun Fombina walaadu Fuuna Lesdi Naajeeriya Dapo Abiodun kanyum on suuditani ka kubaru’en haalakan bawti giidal mabbe dum ballo ardiido Lesdi Naajeeriya Kashim Shettima ardani hawtaade bee wiiki be taskani golloobe ma njobdi ceede den jee Lesbbi jeego.
Kadima Abiodun besdika bee wiiki nder takaramji mabbe woodi haala ko laarani sembidinki sana’aaji enanta kubbirle yiite lamtarki bee shaanu luumooku ‘e waylitaaki nba’ante huutinira bee henndu Gas acca nyebbam peeturuljam.
Dowko Laarani besdaari njobdi ceede golloobe
Abiodun wi min metika woodi taskaramji ‘e jabrude kanndude min thoosi dow halakan.
Ngomnaajo Chukwuma Soludo mo Jihawol Anambra, kanyumma wi fakat ummaatoore Lesdi Naajeeriya do wonndi ‘e yanngada sadirmaaji naawuki Are haa Luumo koodume besdi Ceede ngam besdaari nyebbam peeturuljam.
Prof. Soludo wi Ceede ko taskani sennduki be ngomnati kawtal Lesdi ,Jihaaji enanta be Hukuumaaji Pamari hewtani N900 billion amma ko hewtani N1.9 trillion bo do sankite haa saakaabe kubaruuji Jamanu di goonga ‘e fewre.
SADIQ ALFA

Hooreejo wakiili’en majaliisaabe ndotti’en, Ahmad Lawan kanyumma manitiinaaje golloobe Lesdi Naajeeriya wakkati be wadata seyo lamar nyaloomaa golloobe Lesde Duuniyaaru fu.
Senator Lawan, suuditi manoore nden haa derewol ngol O wadi juude yerdaadum maako nyennde Alat ngol saawi manooje tiinaaje golloobe Lesdi Naajeeriya ko waddani Lesdi ndin jahargal yeeso.
Nden kadi ma O tinnndini boddi golloobe sanne haro wannginki dabareeji kanndudi ngam hurga gannu Lesdi ndin wontiri ndeyefu bee kawtal koppi ngomnati.
SADIQ ALFA

“Ko Alla jeyi en, ko e makko nduttoto-ɗen”. Abuu Mborom Gelaajo ruttiima e joomi men ñalnde 26 mee 2018 hedde tisubaar. O wirnaa ko ñalnde oon kikiiɗe gooto e Nuwaasoot. Sinno leñol fof ina rokkanoo suɓaade yimɓe sappo wuurooɓe haa cay, Abuu Mborom ko heen jeyetenoo. Kono fittaandu kala ko maayooru.
Maayde Abuu Mborom Gelaajo, ko baasal wonande leydi ndii, sibu Abuu Mborom waɗi nguurndam fof ko ina darii mbele leydi Muritani ina wona, rimɗa, yimɓe mum nguura nguurndam moƴƴam.
Ko baasal wonande ɓ
... 
gañgu e dow almudɓe Al-Azhar ndeen… Abuu Mborom Gelaajo, no yoga e yahdiiɓe mum nii, ko neɗɗo tedduɗo, jom piɓle tiiɗɗe, daraninooɗo miijo goodal ndimaagu aadee e neɗɗanke e renndo. Ko waɗi, o leeptiraama ɗuum (o nanngiraama, o leeptiraa, o dummbiraa, o seerndaa e sukaaɓe makko hade makko taccineede feewde Senegaal e 1989 sabu ndee darnde, kono ɗuum meeɗaa yamminde e ndeen darnde… Mayniigu jam ngenndiyanke cuusɗo, caasdo, mo wooda nanndo ! ».
Al Hajji Gay : « Mbayniigu jam yimiyanke mawɗo, harbi
...
k ceedtii e makko koo : « Alaa hare nde Abuu luutaa. Tuggan maa nder kebbaaji Kayhayɗi haa e nder tuddule mooliiɓe to Senegaal, haa e hare nder UFD e ko sakkitii koo e nder UFP, alaa hare nde Abuu tawaaka… » Abuu ko neɗɗo piiltiiɗo jotondire, joom fiɓnde, luulndiiɗo kala fenaande e winndere ndee (yeru kiiɗal Palestiinnaaɓe ekn) haa e nder leydi ndii (omo jeyanoo kadi e fedde REVE 89/90).
Guurɗo fof ko maayoowo, Abuu Mborom tuɗɗiima leppi leydi, leydi tuɗɗii mo leppi teddungal.

Majalissa jiha Ogun borti Tubaljo mabbe Olakunle Oluomo .
Oluomo, mo lutanni suborder Ifo 1 ha majalissa jihakan bortama daga ardungal majalissa kan bawo nde wakili’en sappo e jetati nder nogas e jego wadi jude mortikimo ha ardungal maujm
Wakili’en majalissa kan be latake burna mabbe fu be jamdiyya APC hauri be luttube ha Jamdiyya PDP be borti tubaljo mabbe ha jonde nde ballo tubaljo majalissa kan Mrs Bolanle Ajayi. Ardi ha be kebi nasaraaku bortaaki tubaljo on.
Oluomo tumirama be soinde wawugo ardungal, soinde gongaku, mosle cheede dudde, hautnde be hollugo yaggare ha sare majalissa kan kanju be luttudi hijjaji on majalissa’en ben kolli dalila ko wadi be medi tubaljo on ha ardungal mabbe.
Majalissa kan lori supti Oludaisi Elemide duuw darnde tubaljo kesso mo jabani Odeda ngam jahol yesso sare majalissa majum.
A BELLOS

Pottital Google I/O ko kewu ngu Google yuɓɓinta hitaande kala ngam hollude geɗe kese ɗe heblani aduna oo. E pottital 2023 ngal (Google I/O 2023) ñalnde 10 mee (duujal) 2023, ɓuri holleede heen ko geɗe paatuɗe e ƴoƴre tafaande. Ine heen Firo Huuɓtodinngo (traduction universelle) tuugiingo he PaLM 2.
Yeru, firde wideyoo he nder ɗemngal goɗngal : ɗum fuɗɗortoo ko winnditaade haala wideyoo kaa, e firde ɗum he ngala ɗemngal. Daande woɗnde tara winndannde ndee, kono tawa yaltata ko e hunuko kaalatnooɗo he wideyoo gadano oo. Ƴoƴre tafaande ndee fotnda ɗum haa toni kaaloowo oo e daande mum njahda, nannda he nder wideyooji ɗiɗi ɗii…
No paamraten, maa firo Google yetto nokku ɗo pullo waawoyta yeeɓde filmo piilaaɗo he ɗemngal goɗngal, ɗoon e ɗoon he pulaar.
Walla winndannde waɗaande he gootal e ɗemɗe ɗe Google tammbii ɗee, ndeen winndannde heɓoto ɗoon e ɗoon he ɗemɗe keddiiɗe ɗee, so he binndol, he hito walla he wideyoo, yeru, ɗo Albert Einstein darii ine janngina he engeleere ɗoo, aɗa waawi heɗaade mo ɗoon, omo janngina he pulaar walla he kala ɗemngal ngal njiɗ-ɗaa.
Kattanɗe ngal ɗoo karallaagal ko moolanaaɗe, kono kadi ko kulɓiniiɗe, sibu angal waawi huutoreede he yeeso ngo moƴƴaani, ko wayi no fuuntude (deepfakes). Ɗum noon alaa e sago caaktugol maggal yahda e paddorɗe mawɗe…

Ngomnaajo Jihawol Kwara, AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq wadani tabitinaabe manngu shaanu diidaadi (SAN) haa Jiha maako barka.
Ngomnaajo on suuditi haalakan wakkati O winndana seketeriijo maako mo shaanu kubaruuji, Rafiu Ajakaye haa galluure Ilorin.
O wi “mi wadani loya’en ben barka nden dum hunnde seyo on naa see kambe tan hawti bee Jihakan enanta Lenyol mabbe no foti. Mi wadani be Do’a ALLAH hokkube njamu ‘e juutal balde ngam be be huuwana Lesdi Mabbe.,”
Ngomnaajo on mani boddi mabbe sanne dowko golle mabbe enanta muaamalaaji mabbe bee uummaatoore.
Hunnaabe ben hesbe SAN be Jihawol Kwara woni: Alhaji Abubakar Bature Sulu-Gambari, Prof. Muhammed Taofeeq Abdulrazaq; Bar. Wahab Kunle Shittu; Bar. Oladipo Akanmu Tolani; Bar. Lukman Oyebanji Fagbemi; Bar. Mumini Ishola Hanafi; Dr. Doyin Awoyale; and Bar. Rotimi Oyedepo.
Hooreejo kiita Justice Olukayode Ariwoola CJN, kanyum on hunni be hannde Lewru November 28, 2022,
SADIQ ALFA

Sikkanoo ko kaa haala hankati ko ngoppaaka, laamu nguu haaytii teettude leyɗe daande maayo mawngo ina totta ɗum jananinkooɓe. Ndeke yimɓe tinaani maataani, haa wiyaa wonde lefol leyɗe, tuggi Tararsa haa Daarel Barka haa rewo Ɓoggee, laamu ko ko rokki ɗum jom jawɗeele en, jeyaaɓe to Sawuud, yo ngar ndema heen gemhe, e innde sosiyatee biyeteeɗo Raji.
Sikkanoo ko kaa haala hankati ko ngoppaaka, laamu nguu haaytii teettude leyɗe daande maayo mawngo ina totta ɗum jananinkooɓe. Ndeke yimɓe tinaani maataani, haa wiyaa wonde lefol leyɗe, tuggi Tararsa haa Daarel Barka haa rewo Ɓoggee, laamu ko ko rokki ɗum jom jawɗeele en, jeyaaɓe to Sawuud, yo ngar ndema heen gemhe, e innde sosiyatee biyeteeɗo Raji.
E nder ɗuum, kalifu kaalisaaji hono Caam Jommbaar e kalifu ƴellitaare dowri hono Barahim wul Mbaarek nulanooma to Ɓoggee ngam etaade jaɓnude yimɓe diiwaan Erkiis e Ɓoggee ɓee yo ngoppu sosiyatee Sawuudnaajo oo, hono Rajihi rema 31 000 hektaar ndokkaa ɗii, tuggi Tararsa haa komin Buhdiida (18 kiloo hade maa yettaade Eeleega). E nder batuuji ɓe njuɓɓini to Ngeyrinaat (Komin wul Birom) e to Leggaat (departemaa Erkiis) yimɓe ɓee palaani heen gommbal, mbiyi ko njaɓaani tee njaɓataa rokkude ndii leydi ɗo ɓe ndemata e ɗo jawdi maɓɓe oorata. Tee, aɓe ponndi heen fof, sibu ma ɓe ndaro e haɗde Rajihi remde ɗoon so tawii laamu nguu rokkii ɗum nokku oo.
Ciftinen tan ko e batu hilifaaɓe ñalnde 16 saawiyee 2014 laamu nguu ƴetti yamiroore hasde Rajihi leydi ndii.
